sources.name: EmpFile
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EmpFile

sources.name: DimEmp
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'select MAX(empid) from dbo.dimemp',
	format: 'query') ~> DimEmp
